articles.title: Apple (AAPL) Outpaces Stock Market Gains: What You Should Know
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) closed the most recent trading day at $170.40, moving +1.63% from the previous trading session.

articles.title: Facebook parent Meta set to take nearly 50% cut from virtual sales -- and Apple is calling it out
articles.content: Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc.'s intent to take a nearly 50% cut of digital asset sales within its emerging metaverse is drawing widespread criticism from developers and longtime nemesis Apple Inc.

articles.title: Infosys (INFY) Falls 3% as Q4 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates
articles.content: Infosys' (INFY) fourth-quarter fiscal 2022 results benefit from stellar demand for its products and services amid the ongoing digital transformation wave.

articles.title: Apple (AAPL), Tom Hanks' Playtone Ink Multi-Year Content Deal
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) and Playtone, headed by Tom Hanks and Gary Goetzman, sign a multi-year exclusive deal to develop series, documentaries and unscripted projects for Apple TV+.

articles.title: Adobe (ADBE) Video Collaboration Platform Available for Users
articles.content: Adobe (ADBE) makes Frame.io's video collaboration platform available for Creative Cloud users and brings updates in After Effects and Premiere Pro solutions.

articles.title: BOX to Aid Teams With Secure Collaboration Via Box Canvas
articles.content: BOX unveils a virtual whiteboarding and visual collaboration experience solution named Box Canvas to offer a secure collaboration platform to hybrid teams.

articles.title: Apple TV+ Bringing More Content From This Multi-Oscar Winner: Here's What Viewers Can Expect
articles.content:
A major movie star is coming back to the streaming platform of a major technology company with a new deal that will increase output.
What Happened: Actor Tom Hanks and Gary Goetzman signed a multi-year exclusive deal with their Playtone company and Apple TV+, a streaming platform from Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL), according to a Deadline report.
The deal follows previous collaborations of the movie “Greyhound” and the upcoming series “Masters of the Air,” both of which are offered on Apple TV+.
Among the new content will be a sequel to "Greyhound." 
The new deal will also bring television series, documentaries and unscripted ...

articles.title: GoPro (GPRO) Rolls Out HERO10 Black Bones: Major Highlights
articles.content: GoPro's (GPRO) HERO10 Black Bones FPV drone camera is the lightest GoPro camera weighing only 54 grams

articles.title: TELUS (TU) Rolls Out New Mobile Health Clinic in Calgary
articles.content: TELUS Corporation (TU) teams up with The Alex Community Health Centre sets up a mobile health clinic to provide vulnerable residents of Calgary with access to quality healthcare.

articles.title: Should You Buy Alphabet Before the Stock Split?
articles.content: Alphabet is following the footsteps of other big tech companies like Apple, Tesla, and Nvidia by splitting its stock.
